review_title: Adler university is a horrible employer
pros: Staff events, time off during winter storms
cons: Racist employees that do not ‘see color ‘. I had a few colleagues deal with extremely racist and traumatic experiences from being mocked to not being paid as much as their white counterparts. The university also tried to cover up these incidences in the name of having a good reputation. Would not recommend unless maybe it’s the Chicago campus. Vancouver campus has to many managerial and structural issues. No TRANSPARENCY EITHER! The board of directors hoard all money and resources for themselves yet do not take a fraction of that money to provide proper funding for black students at the Vancouver campus. It’s a horrible university to work at or attend unless you are white or simply don’t mind keeping your head down and staying out of anything
Salary is a bit below the industry standard
